Crypto firm Circle to end support for USDC stablecoin on Tron blockchainMajor U.S. crypto firm Circle will end support for its USDC token on the Tron blockchain network, a decision the company said on Wednesday "aligned with its efforts to ensure that USDC remained trusted, transparent and safe". Wed, 21 Feb 2024 01:05:54 GMT PJEOFHGLX5L2VFEMIXHLYAGCZ4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/crypto-firm-circle-end-support-usdc-stablecoin-tron-blockchain-2024-02-21/Tom Wilson商业金钱的未来
China hopes France continues role in stable Sino-European relations, foreign minister saysChina hopes France will continue a constructive role in developing healthy and stable Sino-European relations by enhancing mutual trust and promoting integration of interests, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 00:03:30 GMT FGFIMBM3CJO6FC7HLLXMPH2SHA https://www.reuters.com/world/china-hopes-france-continues-role-healthy-stable-sino-european-relations-foreign-2024-02-21/Reuters世界
Japan's exports rise 11.9% year/year in JanuaryJapan's exports rose 11.9% in January from the same month a year ago, Ministry of Finance data showed on Wednesday. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 23:55:09 GMT CGTSA3FICFLP5EFVSIGUHP3LE4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/japans-exports-rise-119-yearyear-january-2024-02-20/Reuters市场亚洲市场
China disappointed over US veto on Israel-Hamas ceasefire vote, Xinhua reportsChina expressed "strong disappointment" over the United States blocking a draft United Nations Security Council resolution on the Israel-Hamas war calling for an immediate humanitarian ceasefire, Xinhua reported on Wednesday, citing China's permanent representative to the United Nations Zhang Jun. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 23:44:40 GMT B6A6PREZLJLLJNJJGZP3GCGVL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china-disappointed-over-us-veto-israel-hamas-ceasefire-vote-xinhua-reports-2024-02-20/Reuters世界

Oaktree works to extend Inter Milan financing package as deadline looms, sources sayOaktree Capital Management is working to extend a 275 million euro ($298 million) loan to Italy's top flight soccer club Inter Milan before it expires in May, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.
